description: This file defines API routes for managing workout plans within a fitness or workout management backend. It uses FastAPI's APIRouter to implement CRUD operations for workout plans, with ownership and permission checks, integration with a database via SQLAlchemy, and includes external dependencies such as security, pagination, and service logic.

methods.name: list_workouts( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), )
methods.description: List workout plans with ownership checks, supporting pagination.

methods.name: create_workout( payload: WorkoutPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Create a new workout plan, enforcing ownership and limits.

methods.name: get_workout( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Retrieve a specific workout plan by ID with ownership validation.

methods.name: update_workout( plan_id: int, payload: WorkoutPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Update an existing workout plan after verifying ownership and possibly changing ownership.

methods.name: delete_workout( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Delete a specific workout plan with ownership enforcement.

ctags.name: create_workout
ctags.signature: ( payload: WorkoutPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: delete_workout
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_workout
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: list_workouts
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), )

ctags.name: update_workout
ctags.signature: ( plan_id: int, payload: WorkoutPlanCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
